metadata.title: Test that the check_existence property is properly supported using the specified value
metadata.description: Make sure that the value specified, for the check_existence property, is properly supported for the ind-def:variable_test.

criterion.comment: Test to see that every variable item exists for the specified object.

metadata.title: Test that the check_existence property is properly supported using the specified value
metadata.description: Make sure that the value specified, for the check_existence property, is properly supported for the ind-def:variable_test.

criterion.comment: Test to see that any variable items exist for the specified object.

metadata.title: Test that the check_existence property is properly supported using the specified value
metadata.description: Make sure that the value specified, for the check_existence property, is properly supported for the ind-def:variable_test.

criterion.comment: Test to see that at least one variable item exists for the specified object.

metadata.title: Test that the check_existence property is properly supported using the specified value
metadata.description: Make sure that the value specified, for the check_existence property, is properly supported for the ind-def:variable_test.

criterion.comment: Test to see that no variable items exist for the specified object.

metadata.title: Test that the check_existence property is properly supported using the specified value
metadata.description: Make sure that the value specified, for the check_existence property, is properly supported for the ind-def:variable_test.

criterion.comment: Test to see that only one variable item exists for the specified object.

metadata.title: Test the value entity with the not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the value entity properly supports the not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the value is not equal to 2.

metadata.title: Test the var_ref entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the var_ref entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the var_ref equals oval:nist.validation.r400.2.1:var:1 (value='test').

metadata.title: Test the value entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the value entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the value equals foo.bar.

metadata.title: Test the var_ref entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the var_ref entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the var_ref equals foo.bar.

metadata.title: Test the value entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the value entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the value equals 1.

variable_test.comment: Test to see that every variable item exists for the specified object.
Test to see that any variable items exist for the specified object.
Test to see that at least one variable item exists for the specified object.
Test to see that no variable items exist for the specified object.
Test to see that only one variable item exists for the specified object.
Test to see that the value is not equal to 2.
Test to see that the var_ref equals oval:nist.validation.r400.2.1:var:1 (value='test').
Test to see that the value equals foo.bar.
Test to see that the var_ref equals foo.bar.
Test to see that the value equals 1.

constant_variable.comment: This variable contains the string value 'test'.
This variable contains the boolean value 'true'.
This variable contains the integer value '1'.
This variable contains the binary value '9f'.
This variable contains the float value '1.5'.
This variable contains the evr_string value '1:23-2a'.
This variable contains the fileset_revision value 'A.03.61.00'.
This variable contains the ios_version value '3.2.4'.
This variable contains the ip4_address value '2.2.2.2'.
This variable contains the ip6_address value '2001:0db8:85a3:0000:0000:8a2e:0370:7334'.
This variable contains the version value '2-2-35'.
This variable contains the string value '^[Oo]val:nist\.validation\.variable:var:\d+$'.
This variable contains the string value 'TesT'.
This variable contains the string value 'TesT1'.
This variable contains the boolean value 'false'.
